title: How to Enable Demo Mode on Android

steps.title: Unlock your device.
steps.content: Unlock your device. Unlock it using your fingerprint/pattern/PIN, etc.

steps.title: Go to the device's settings.
steps.content: Go to the device's settings. There are 2 ways to get to them. Swipe up from the notification panel, and click on the settings icon. Find the device's settings app in the app menu.

steps.title: Find the About Phone section.
steps.content: Find the About Phone section. Usually, you'll need to scroll down to the very bottom.

steps.title: Click on Software Info and click 5 or 7 times on the Build Number button.
steps.content: Click on Software Info and click 5 or 7 times on the Build Number button. This will enable developer options.

steps.title: Go into the first setting panel again and click on Developer Options.
steps.content: Go into the first setting panel again and click on Developer Options . It should be just under or on top of "About Phone".

steps.title: Scroll down until you find Demo Mode.
steps.content: Scroll down until you find Demo Mode . Enable it, and you're finished!
